# Request for Information
## RFI-2022-01

### Amendment 6
**Contract Details:**

| **Category** | **Value** | **Status** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Request for Information (RFI) | **National Capital Region (NCR)** | Expiré (Expired) |

### Overview

The Standards Council of Canada (SCC) invites qualified vendors to participate in a Request for Information (RFI) process for the provision of options to redesign SCC's office space at 55 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa to support its new flexible work model. 

### Description

The SCC seeks to maximize productivity, serviceability, collaboration, and the office as a destination within its available redevelopment and fit-out budget. The design should prioritize environmental sustainability and efficiency, and 'made in Canada' in the fit-out. 

### Scope

The proposed design should:

*   Incorporate some existing office equipment for reuse and repurposing within the broader parameters of the design brief
*   Include confidential meeting areas and equipment and file storage areas 
*   Revitalize an impersonal space to make it more welcoming.
*   Use 'made in Canada' components to meet local procurement requirements

### Procurement Details

| **Category** | **Value** | **Status** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Commercial and office building renovation and repair service |  | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner |
| Service d'installation ou de reconfiguration de mobilier de bureau          |        | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner |
| Design d'intérieur ou décoration |       | Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner |

### Tenders

Tenders can be submitted to the contracting entity at:

*   Address: 55 Metcalfe Street, Suite 600, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1P 6L5
*   Phone: (613) 238-3222 
*   Email: [contracts@scc.ca](mailto:contracts@scc.ca)

### Submissions

Submissions in English and French should be made electronically by downloading the document from the [Government Tender Alert website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

By Invitation Only will consider Expressions of Interest and would contact the shortlisted bidders to invite them to submit proposals. 

Shortlisting will be based on a pre-determined evaluation criteria. To get advice on the intended evaluation methodology for this requirement
